title: Miracles and a Siege
summary: Elisha makes an iron axe head float and exposes the movements of the Syrian army, frustrating the king of Aram. When the Syrian army surrounds Dothan to capture Elisha, God blinds them, and Elisha leads them into Samaria. Later, Samaria suffers a severe siege, but Elisha prophesies deliverance.

faq.question: How did Elisha save the borrowed axe head?
faq.answer: He threw a stick into the water and caused the iron axe head to float.

faq.question: What did Elisha do when the Arameans surrounded him?
faq.answer: He prayed for them to be blinded and led them into Samaria.
